SEARCH
Package com.paradegame.view

Class InputHandler

java.lang.Object
com.paradegame.view.InputHandler
public class InputHandler extends Object
The InputHandler class is responsible for handling user input during the game. It prompts the user for various choices, such as the game mode, number of players, AI difficulty, and card selection. It also ensures that the input is valid before proceeding.

  • Constructor Details

    • InputHandler

      public InputHandler(ConsoleView consoleView)
      Constructs an InputHandler instance, initialising the scanner and consoleView.
      Parameters:
      consoleView - the console view to be used for displaying prompts and game state

  • Method Details

    • promptForGameMode

      public boolean promptForGameMode()
      Prompts the player to choose the game mode (versus humans or versus AI).
      Returns:
      true if AI mode is selected, false if human mode is selected

    • promptForHumans

      public int promptForHumans(boolean aiEnabled)
      Prompts the user to enter the number of human players.
      Parameters:
      aiEnabled - true if AI is enabled, restricting human players to 5.
      Returns:
      the number of human players

    • promptForDifficulty

      public String promptForDifficulty()
      Prompts the user to select the AI difficulty level.
      Returns:
      the selected difficulty level (Easy, Medium, or Hard)

    • promptForNumAI

      public int promptForNumAI(int numHumans)
      Prompts the user to enter the number of AI players.
      Parameters:
      numHumans - the number of human players that was already selected
      Returns:
      the number of AI players

    • promptPlayerForCard

      public int promptPlayerForCard(Player player, GameState gameState, CardDisplayer cardDisplayer)
      Prompts the player to select a card to play or discard.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who is making the selection
      gameState - the current state of the game
      cardDisplayer - the CardDisplayer used to display cards
      Returns:
      the index of the selected card

    • promptForNextTurn

      public void promptForNextTurn()
      Prompts the user to proceed to the next turn.
